tests._comment1_: Default Tests with the quadratic equation.

SimpleString_Quadratic_CS.expected: x equals the fraction with numerator negative b plus or minus the square root of b squared minus 4 a c and denominator 2 a

SimpleString_Quadratic_CV.expected: x equals negative b plus or minus Square root of b squared minus four times a times c divided by two times a

SimpleString_Quadratic_MS.expected: x equals StartFraction negative b plus or minus StartRoot b squared minus 4 a c EndRoot Over 2 a EndFraction

Acss_Quadratic_CS.expected: (exp "x equals" (pause . 250) "the fraction with numerator negative b plus or minus the square root of b squared minus" (text ((richness . 6)) "4 a c") (pause . 250) "and denominator" (text ((richness . 6)) "2 a"))

Acss_Quadratic_CV.expected: (exp "x" (pause . 200) "equals" (pause . 450) (text ((richness . 6)) "negative b plus or minus Square root of") (text ((richness . 7)) "b") (text ((richness . 7) (average-pitch . 6)) "squared") (pause . 300) (text ((richness . 7)) "minus four times a times c") (pause . 650) "divided by" (text ((richness . 4)) "two times a"))

Acss_Quadratic_MS.expected: (exp "x equals" (pause . 250) "the fraction with numerator negative b plus or minus the square root of b squared minus" (text ((richness . 6)) "4 a c") (pause . 250) "and denominator" (text ((richness . 6)) "2 a"))
